sources.title: Gun Lords of Stirrup Basin (1937)
sources.description: Lawyer Bowdre has started a war between the ranchers and the homesteaders planning to take over the homesteaders land when they are wiped out. Rancher Dan Stockton, having just married homesteader Gail Dawson, is caught in the middle. He suspects Bowdre is behind the war and it's not long before he gets a chance to prove it. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/gun-lords-of-stirrup-basin-1937/

sources.title: Gun Lords Of Stirrup Basin (1937) BOB STEELE
sources.description: A cattleman's son (Bob Steele) and a settler's daughter (Louise Stanley) are caught in a feud caused by a lawyer (Karl Hackett).

sources.title: Gun Lords of Stirrup Basin (1937) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Louise Stanley, Karl Hackett
 Director: Sam Newfield

 Lawyer Bowdre has started a war between the ranchers and the homesteaders planning to take over the homesteaders land when they are wiped out. Rancher Dan Stockton, having just married homesteader Gail Dawson, is caught in the middle. He suspects Bowdre is behind the war and it's not long before he gets a chance to prove it.

metadata.Plot: Lawyer Bowdre has started a war between the ranchers and the homesteaders planning to take over the homesteaders land when they are wiped out. Rancher Dan Stockton, having just married homesteader Gail Dawson, is caught in the middle. He suspects Bowdre is behind the war and it's not long before he gets a chance to prove it.
metadata.Writer: Harry F. Olmsted, George H. Plympton, Fred Myton
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Louise Stanley, Karl Hackett
